name: Laserstorm
description:
Laserstorm is a multiplayer top down game and is available for free for the duration of the Alpha test.

Currently has one gamemode, FFA with up to 4 players, and more to come. We're dedicated to improving the game as much as we can and fully release it further down the line.

You can find our discord here, where you can leave any kind of feedback, suggestions, and talk to the rest of the community!

Controls

  • Move with WASD
  • Dash in the direction of the cursor with Left Shift
  • Shoot with Mouse 1
  • Bring up the "pause" menu by pressing Esc
  • Open in game chat with Enter / Return
